pkgmetadata.longdescription:
emtee is a simple script to speed up @world updates on Gentoo Linux systems, by significantly decreasing the time taken for the initial dependency resolution stage (often the dominant component for SBCs and other resource-challenged systems, particularly where a binhost is deployed).
It can be used in place of invocations like: emerge -DuU --with-bdeps=y --keep-going @world (and similar).
